mapper.select: SELECT A.IN_NO, A.MTR_CD, A.ORD_NO, A.FLT_AMT, A.IN_AMT, A.TOT_COST, A.UNIT_COST, B.MTR_NM, B.UNIT, C.ORD_AMT, C.NOTIN_AMT, TO_CHAR(A.IN_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS IN_DATE, FN_GET_BAS_DTL_CD_TO_NM(B.UNIT) AS UNIT_NM, FN_GET_BAS_DTL_CD_TO_NM(B.COMP_CD) AS COMP_NM FROM MTR_IN A, ADM_MTR B, MTR_ORD_DTL C WHERE A.MTR_CD = B.MTR_CD
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MTR_IN ( IN_NO, MTR_CD, IN_DATE, ORD_NO, UNIT, IN_AMT, FLT_AMT, UNIT_COST, TOT_COST, EMP_NO ) VALUES( #{inNo}, #{mtrCd}, SYSDATE, #{ordNo}, #{unit}, #{inAmt}, #{fltAmt}, #{unitCost}, (#{unitCost}*#{inAmt}), #{empNo} )
mapper.update: UPDATE MTR_ORD_DTL SET IN_AMT = (NVL(IN_AMT,0)+NVL(#{inAmt},0)), FLT_AMT = (NVL(FLT_AMT,0)+NVL(#{fltAmt},0)), NOTIN_AMT = (#{notinAmt} -NVL(#{inAmt},0) -NVL(#{fltAmt},0)) WHERE ORD_NO = #{ordNo} AND MTR_CD = #{mtrCd}
UPDATE MTR_IN SET MTR_CD = #{mtrCd}, UNIT = #{unit}, IN_AMT = #{inAmt}, FLT_AMT = #{fltAmt}, UNIT_COST = #{unitCost}, TOT_COST = (#{unitCost}*#{inAmt}) WHERE IN_NO = #{inNo}
